dataPieces.name: Garage door instruction
dataPieces.content: Toggle the door with the password 0359a

dataPieces.name: Confidential: The Vortex
dataPieces.content: The Vortex is an organization founded by xxx. On the surface, it appears to be a fund raiser for the homeless, but many suspects that there are more to this organization. The only found suspicous activity up to this point is that: members of this organization often spell the word "cyclone" to each other.
